posts.title: To deploy hexo blog
posts.text: 部署 Hexo 博客到 Github Pages 时遇到的一个坑 1.当 使用 git 仓库部署时 1234fatal: 'github.com' does not appear to be a git repositoryfatal: Could not read from remote repository.Please make sure you have the correct access rightsand the repository exists. 2.当使用 HTTPS 仓库 部署时 123Error: bash: /dev/tty: No such device or addresserror: failed to execute prompt script (exit code 1)fatal: could not read Username for 'https://github.com': Invalid argument 解决方法 使用带用户名和密码的 HTTPS 链接 1https://<yourusername>:<yourpwd>@github.com/zz1985summer/zz1985summer.github.io.git

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
